content:
"You've fallen into my trap!" Justin shouts, laughing like the madman he is. The mouse he captured stares back at him indifferently as it munches on a piece of cheese at the bottom of a box whose base measures $12\text{ cm}$ by $12\text{ cm}$.

**Move the points on the grid below to draw the base of the box in which the mouse is trapped.**

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]]
